metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27741 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Citadel WebCit through 926 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via multiple pages and parameters. NOTE: this was reported to the vendor in a publicly archived "Multiple Security Vulnerabilities in WebCit 926" thread.

criterions.comment: webcit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
